articles.title: Docs discuss case of 3rd person cured of HIV after stem cell transplant - Bay Area Reporter, America's highest circulation LGBT newspaper
articles.description: A woman in New York City who has no detectable HIV after undergoing a new type of stem cell transplant may represent another rare cure, researchers reported February 15 at the annual Conference on Retroviruses and Opportunistic Infections.
